Master of Science in Data Science, Analytics and Engineering, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ (Aug 2024 - Present)

- Relevant Coursework: Statistical Machine Learning, Big Data Analysis, Data Mining, Applied Statistics
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science (AI/ML Specialization), Vellore Institute of Technology, Chennai, India (Aug 2020 - May 2024)

- Graduated with Distinction; developed a strong foundation in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

- Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing
normalized_sections.technicalskills:
- Programming & Query Languages – Python, R, Java, SQL, Git, C, C++

- Databases – MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, SQLite, Databricks, PySpark

- Analytics & Visualization – Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Power BI, Tableau, Excel

- Applied Statistics – Hypothesis Testing, Regression Analysis, Causal Inference, Time Series Forecasting

- Machine Learning – Predictive Modeling, Deep Learning, NLP, Anomaly Detection, Gradient Boosted Models
normalized_sections.experience:
Data Analyst Intern, Amrutanjan Health Care Ltd., Chennai, India (May 2023 - Jul 2023)

- Analyzed 2017-2018 sales datasets using statistical modeling and Machine Learning to identify key trends.

- Built and automated interactive dashboards, accelerating data-driven decisions across teams.

- Delivered actionable insights that improved forecasting accuracy by 15% and guided strategic planning.
Research Intern, VIT Chennai & Global Health Research and Innovations Canada (Dec 2022 - Aug 2023)

- Investigated edge computing and AR/VR in Internet of Medical Things to enhance healthcare equity and access.

- Conducted a systematic literature review to evaluate feasibility and barriers present in digital health.

- Provided evidence-based recommendations that influenced research and promoted healthcare accessibility.
normalized_sections.projects:
MAILY – AI Mailing and Schedule Agent (Jun 2025)

- Developed an n8n AI agent that automates email and scheduling via Gmail, Calendar, and Sheets.

- Implemented contact verification workflows ensuring email addresses are validated before sending messages.

- Delivered an AI system that schedules meetings, sends emails, and maintains context with LLM reasoning.

- Enhanced scheduling efficiency through automated workflows, reducing manual coordination.
AITravel Itinerary Planner (Apr 2025)

- Engineered an AI-driven platform that generates optimized multi-day travel itineraries with real-time route refinement.

- Integrated cost estimation, weather forecasts, and interactive map visualizations, improving planning accuracy by 30%.

- Designed a feedback-driven loop to test itinerary variations, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.
Path2Pro – AI-Powered Job Portal (Mar 2025)

- Built an AI job-matching portal with semantic similarity scoring and automated resume parsing for 100+ applications.

- Developed secure recruiter/applicant dashboards with authentication, job posting, and real-time resume uploads.

- Implemented skill-gap analysis with personalized course recommendations, reducing screening time by 25%.

- Won the People’s Choice Award at Hack AZ on a 0.1 for innovation and impact.
normalized_sections.publications: Lakshminarayanan, V., et al. (2023). Healthcare equity through intelligent edge computing and augmented reality/virtual reality: A systematic review. Journal of Multidisciplinary Healthcare, 16, 2839–2859. https://doi.org/10.2147/JMDH.S419923
